alert.note: Alert for Brown; Jackson; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 8:31PM CDT until April 29 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN NEMAHA...NORTHERN JACKSON AND WESTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hamlin to 4 miles west of Horton to 3 miles northeast of Holton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holton, Sabetha, Horton, Wetmore, Fairview, Morrill, Whiting, Circleville, Netawaka, Soldier, Goff, Powhattan, Oneida, Hamlin, Kickapoo Reservation and Woodlawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
